descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
🏆 VR Game of the Year, The EDGE Awards 2023
🏆 Best VR / AR Game Nominee, The Game Awards 2023
🏆 The 50 Best Video Games of 2023, #24, Polygon
🏆 Best Reviewed Games of 2023 (9 out of 10), IGN
🏆 2023's Best Puzzle Game, Game Informer

HUMANITY is a third-person puzzle-action game where you become a dog to command massive, marching crowds of people to jump, turn, push, float, shoot, and climb their way to salvation across 90 story-mode stages.

READY, AND...ACTION!
Devious puzzles and strategic thinking is broken up with more action-focused elements and platformer-like levels, even some epic boss battles!

UGC = USER-GENERATED CONTENT, UNLIMITED GRATIFYING CHALLENGES
Browse an ever-growing library of stages created by other players. Play, rate, and discover new types of puzzles in this limitless vault.

CREATE AND SHARE LEVELS
Bring your ideas to life using the intuitive Stage Creator, be it a straightforward puzzle, action stage, or heck, even an artful sculpture!  

Watch as breathtaking swarms of people follow your commands to the exit, all in HUMANITY’s stark iconic style, courtesy of director and celebrated visual designer Yugo Nakamura and famed game creator Tetsuya Mizuguchi (Rez Infinite, Tetris Effect: Connected).

🏆 Best Games of the Year, #4, The EDGE Awards 2023
🏆 The 10 Best Games of 2023, Jacob Geller
🏆 Indie Game of the Year, Shacknews
